Post.title: grunt
Post.content:
• initConfig uglify

    build * js build/app.min.js

  • initConfig less

    compile main.less grunt-contrib-less css main.less import css build/app.min.js

  • initConfig watch

    scripts watch * uglify less tasks

    • grunt.loadNpmTasks(grunt-contrib-uglify);
    • grunt.loadNpmTasks(grunt-contrib-less);
    • grunt.loadNpmTasks(grunt-contrib-watch);

  • grunt.registerTask(default, [uglify, less, watch]);

package.json

Q: grunt: watch ENOSPC

A: echo fs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288 | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf && sudo sysctl -p
Post.more:

Post.title: hexo
Post._content:
### hexo 
- - - - 
[hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn)
- - - -

#### 
```
$ npm install -g hexo-cli
```
<!--more-->

#### 
```
$ hexo init <folder>
$ cd <folder>
$ npm install
```

#### 
> new 

```
$ hexo new [layout] <title>
```


> generate

```
$ hexo generate
$ hexo g ()
```


> server

```
$ hexo server
```
(4000)

> deploy

```
$ hexo deploy
$ hexo d ()
$ hexo d -g ()
```


> clean

```
$ hexo clean
```
Post.raw:
---
title: hexo 
date: 2017-03-26 21:16:14
tag: ["hexo"]
---

### hexo 
- - - - 
[hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn)
- - - -

#### 
```
$ npm install -g hexo-cli
```
<!--more-->

#### 
```
$ hexo init <folder>
$ cd <folder>
$ npm install
```

#### 
> new 

```
$ hexo new [layout] <title>
```


> generate

```
$ hexo generate
$ hexo g ()
```


> server

```
$ hexo server
```
(4000)

> deploy

```
$ hexo deploy
$ hexo d ()
$ hexo d -g ()
```


> clean

```
$ hexo clean
```
